VirtualKeyboardGeometrychange_event.summary:
The geometrychange event of the
interface fires when the on-screen virtual keyboard is toggled between shown and hidden states.

remarks.para: The geometrychange event is useful to detect when the virtual keyboard appears and disappears, so you can adjust the layout as appropriate. This is necessary when using the {{domxref("VirtualKeyboard_API", "Virtual Keyboard API", "", "nocode")}} to disable the browser's default automatic resizing of the viewport when the virtual keyboard is shown and hidden.
